name: 31 Friends A' Hauntin'
description:
The month is October. The best month.

The month of the only holiday that matters, Halloween.

The month where ALL of the creepy crawlers and spooky characters come out to play.

 The one month that our protagonist, Sylvester Greenhead, WISHES he could enjoy.

 Friendless and without a trick or treating party, our protagonist is approached by Count Dracula, who has one fiendish deal in store for our lonely signsmith... Who knows what'll happen next?


31 Friends A' Hauntin' is a Friend Collection Exploration RPG made in a single month about celebrating Halloween, making friends, and killing Dracula. In this game, there are some of the following hit features:

-Up to 31 friends (including yourself), all with their own original, bare-bones movesets, to collect!

-Advanced trick-or-treating mechanics, realistic to the world around us.

-A 2 hour adventure of Halloween fun!

-Combat that's kinda fun!

-Two endings!

-Incredible comedic timing.

-Whatever the hell "Pister Beans" are.

-A game where you get to kill Count Dracula.

Well? Are you not convinced? What are you waiting for? Go on! Get out there! Go collect some friends, trick or treat, and have yourself a HAPPY HALLOWEEN!!
